Automatic retaliation through Paranoia

Self-sustaining through dark damage healing

builds.playstyle: Build dark stacks through constant shard generation, consume them for massive burst, repeat with attack speed that compounds with every hit

memories.name: Shadow Volley
memories.rationale: Twilight converts attacks to Dark and consumes 3+ stacks for 54% damage per stack + 6 healing per stack, Dusk fires 2 dark shards per attack for 5s (rapid stack application), Starry Sky increases attack speed up to 40% with dark damage (Twilight + Dusk + Starry Sky is a triple dark synergy worth 32pts total)

memories.name: Cutthroat
memories.rationale: Crimson empowers every 4th attack with 100% Dark explosion + 22% heal per enemy (Crimson + Domination is 18pt crit scaling synergy), Domination scales crit damage infinitely, Fangs guarantees crits every 4th attack and reduces cooldown

memories.name: Vile Strike
memories.rationale: Abyss converts ALL Vile Strike damage to Dark (feeding Twilight stacks), Obsidian empowers next attack for 250% Dark damage + 1s CDR, Composure increases crit chance by 30% for 5s after casting

memories.name: Umbral Edge
memories.rationale: Umbra scales damage by 42% of crit chance and heals from dark damage, Clemency provides 4% leech from all damage, Momentum reduces cooldowns with each attack

builds.strategy: Cast Shadow Volley to activate Dusk (2 dark shards per attack for 5s) and Starry Sky (10% attack speed per hit, up to 40% with dark damage). Every basic attack is Dark (Twilight) and fires 2 additional dark shards (Dusk), building dark stacks extremely fast. Starry Sky compounds attack speed with every dark hit. When targets reach 3+ dark stacks, Twilight consumes them for 54% damage per stack + 6 healing per stack. Cutthroat with Crimson + Fangs means every 4th attack explodes for 100% Dark damage, heals 22% per enemy, guarantees a crit, and reduces cooldown. Domination scales crit damage infinitely from all these crits. Vile Strike with Abyss converts its 200% damage fully to Dark (more stacks), Obsidian adds 250% Dark burst, and Composure gives 30% crit for 5s. Umbral Edge with Umbra adds 42% of crit chance as bonus damage to everything. The result: a hurricane of dark shards, explosions, and stack consumption.
strengths: Triple dark synergy on Shadow Volley (Twilight + Dusk + Starry Sky, ~32pts)
Crimson + Domination crit scaling (18pt synergy)
Attack speed compounds with every dark hit through Starry Sky
Massive dark stack generation through Dusk shards + Twilight conversion
Self-healing through Twilight consumption, Crimson explosions, Umbra, and Clemency
250% Dark burst from Obsidian on Vile Strike
Infinite crit damage scaling through Domination + Fangs
weaknesses: Requires dark stack buildup before maximum burst
Complex resource tracking (dark stacks, crit chance, ability timers)
Dark-focused - weaker against dark-resistant enemies
Requires multiple epic/legendary essences
